column2: "Na aber a Balaam hun dɛ asɔ EWURADZE enyi dɛ ohyira Israel no
column3: ɔannkɔ ebisa bio
column5: mbom ɔdze n'enyi kedzii sar no do."

column3: na ohun Israel dɛ wogu hɔ dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusuakuw ebusuakuw tsetsee; na Nyankopɔn sunsum baa no do."
Beor babanyin Balaam se dɛ
column4: Ɔbanyin a n'enyi hu adze yie no se dɛ:"

column3: Nyia ohu Twerammpon enyido adze no
mbrɛ wo tsenabea dua yɛ fɛw a
Dɛ esutsen ho nture
column4: Dɛ  alɔe  ndua a EWURADZE atsetsɛw

column3: Na n'asefo bɛtsena nsu pii mu
column4: Na ne hen bɔkrɔn asen Agag

column2: "Nyame eyi no efi Egypt; Ɔwɔ ahoɔdzen dɛ ɔnantwi bɔyafo: Ɔbɛmen amanaman a wɔyɛ n'atamfo
column3: Na woebubu hɔn mbiew esinesin
column4: Na ɔdze n'egyen menaba ehwirahwira hɔn mu."

column3: ɔdaa famu dɛ ogyata
column4: Na dɛ ogyataber; woana na obopusuw no? Nhyira nka obiara a ohyira wo
column5: Na mpaa nka obiara a ɔpaa wo."

column3: na ɔbɔɔ ne nsamu: na Balak see Balaam dɛ
column7: ɔwo ehyira hɔn mpɛn ebiasa nye yi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei guan kɔ mbrɛ ifi: modween dɛ nkyɛ mebɛhyɛ wo enyimnyam kɛse; na
column3: hwɛ
Ana mannka annkyerɛ w'abɔfoe a esomaa hɔn me nkyɛn no so dɛ
column5: "Sɛ Balak dze dwetɛ nye sika ne fi ma mpo bɛma me a
column6: murunntum mummbu EWURADZE n'asɛm do mommbɔ me tsir mu nnkɛyɛ papa anaa bɔn: dza EWURADZE bɛka no

column3: hwɛ
column5: na memma hu dza ɔman yi dze bɛyɛ wo man wɔ nda a odzi ekyir no mu."

column3: Beor babanyin Balaam se dɛ
column4: Ɔbanyin a n'enyi emua no se dɛ:"

column3: Na onyim Abɔso no ho nyimdzee no
column4: Nyia ohu Twerammpon enyido adze no
column6: wɔtseew n'enyi do no ɔse dɛ:"

column3: nnyɛ sesei dze a: Mohwɛ no
column4: ɔmmbɛn dze: Nworaba bi fi Jakob mu bopue
column5: Na ahempoma befi Israel mu asoɛr
column6: Na wɔabɔ afa Moab nkukuwa mu
column7: Na wɔadwerew ɔko mba gyigyeegye no nyinara."

column3: Seir so a wɔyɛ n'atamfo bɛyɛ n'adzenyadze; Na Israel bɛyɛ mbanyindze ara."

column2: "Na obi fi Jakob mu bedzi tum
column3: Na ɔasɛɛ kurow no mu dza aka no."
na ɔsɔɔw ne kasaa no do see dɛ Amalek nye amanaman mu odzikamfo; Na n'ewiei bowie no ɔsɛɛ mu."
na ɔkasaa bio see dɛ
column5: Na wɔdze wo berɛbuw ahyɛ ɔbotan mu."

column3: Ekodu dɛ Assur bɛfa wo ndɔmmum."

column2: "Na owiee ne kasaa no obuu no bɛ see dɛ
column3: Ebei
column4: Nyame reyɛ iyi no woana bɛtsena ase?"

column2: "Na ahɛn befi Kittim mbew do aba
column3: Na wɔabɛhaw Assur
column5: Na ɔnoara so ewie no ɔsɛɛ mu."

column3: na osii mu sanee kɔr ne tsenabew: na Balak so faa no kwan kɔree."
